duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide 1st & 2nd deskside support to the customer’s client by using troubleshooting skills and knowledge to determine the root cause of a fault and resolve or re-assign to the correct team.
Support IT Tech bars and drop-in clinics, as well as assisting with floor walks when required.
Update asset management tool in line with documented procedures and manage all assets within their control.
Document and report on work completed within the Service Management tool ServiceNow by creating and updating tickets for all assistance provided.
Escalate issues in line with Company processes to ensure customer demands are met and maintain and improve customer satisfaction levels.
Provide local hands and eyes assistance to remote support groups.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Information Technology or a related field (Master's preferred)
